name: xiaomi hoto smart kitchen scale black
description:
Product Features:
• 0.1g highly-precise sensor
• Switch between 4 units of weight: g/ml/oz/lb: oz
• Hand drip assistant feature (Require MI Home App)
• Record delicious ingredients
• All necessary functions into one button

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 181.8 x 168 x 26.8mm
• Net Weight: Approximate 342g
• Battery: 3 AAA batteries
• Wireless Connection: Bluetooth 4.0 (Approximate 8m transmission distance
• Operating Temperature: 10 - 20°C
• Storage Temperature: Between -10°C and 50°C

Requirements for Equipment: Android 4.4 / iOS 8.0 and above, Bluetooth 4.0

Package Contents:
• Xiaomi HOTO Smart Kitchen Scale Black QWCFC001 x1
